channel.title: Music Toggle
channel.description: I'm having trouble adding the Music Toggle button on the Login screen, can anyone point me to a newer thread about this or explain to me how this works? Trying to learn myself, but everytime I do this, the sprite will show up, but when I click it the sprite disappears leaving a weird music coming from the client.
